seo.title: Cartagena with Neys | Tours in Cartagena & the Caribbean
seo.description: Experience Cartagena with Neys, your trusted tour guide. Discover islands, beaches, city tours and unforgettable experiences. Text me on WhatsApp!

hero.welcome: Hi, I'm Neys, your trusted tour guide. Join me to discover the wonders of the Caribbean region.

cta.whatsapp_message: Hi, I'm interested in this tour

tours.atardecer_sibarita: Dinner on board with stunning sunset views over Cartagena bay.
tours.chiva_rumbera: Night tour with music, dance and fun around the city streets.
tours.city_tour: Discover the historic center, walls and landmarks with a local guide.
tours.eteka_beach: Beach day at a private resort with a relaxed vibe and premium services.
tours.pao_pao: Food and beach experience in a unique tropical setting.
tours.playa_blanca: Crystal-clear waters and white sand to enjoy the Caribbean.
tours.playa_tranquila: A peaceful paradise ideal to relax away from the crowds.
tours.tour_cinco_islas: Island-hopping to the most beautiful spots with snorkeling and sun.
tours.volcan_totumo: Relax in the volcanic mud with therapeutic properties and visit nearby lagoons.
tours.tour_palenque: Learn about San Basilio de Palenque's history and culture, an oral and intangible heritage.
tours.top3_islas_vip: Day trip to three top islands with VIP perks: beach club, lunch, and speedboat.
tours.bora_bora: Beach club experience at Bora Bora (Barú) with lunch and sunbeds.
tours.top4_islas_vip: Tour across four paradise islands with VIP service.
tours.cholon: Party at Cholón: boats, music and sandbars in Rosario Islands.
tours.barranquilla_tour: Full-day excursion to Barranquilla: iconic spots, riverside and gastronomy.
tours.luxury: Luxury day pass with premium services and VIP areas.
tours.isla_lizmar: Day pass at Lizmar Island with beach, lunch and facilities.
tours.isla_del_sol: Relaxing day at Isla del Sol with lunch and amenities.
tours.isla_pirata: Rustic charm, crystal-clear waters and snorkeling spots.
tours.isla_cocotera: Day trip to Cocotera Island with quiet beaches and Caribbean vibes.
tours.isla_del_encanto: All-inclusive day pass at Isla del Encanto with pool and beach.
tours.isla_encantada: Charming getaway with lunch and beach club services.
tours.isla_paue: Premium day pass at Isla Paue with beach, lunch and lounge areas.
tours.cena_sibarita: Onboard dinner on Sibarita with a special menu and night bay views.
tours.isla_ibbiza: Day pass at Isla de Ibbiza with beach, lunch and sunbeds.
tours.tour_bahia: Sightseeing tour around Cartagena bay with iconic views.
tours.barco_pirata: Themed experience aboard a pirate ship around the bay.

services.alquiler_caballos: Guided horseback rides through natural landscapes.
services.alquiler_cuatrimoto: Off-road ATV adventures on exciting routes.
services.alquiler_yates: Private yachts and boats for trips and special events.
